data.name: GetStartedText
data.value:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce at quam pulvinar, rutrum metus vitae, luctus odio. Maecenas auctor vehicula diam ut luctus. Vestibulum ac iaculis metus. Etiam ac pretium felis. Vestibulum feugiat bibendum nibh quis euismod. Ut enim elit, facilisis ac velit sit amet, porttitor luctus odio. Maecenas elit ipsum, faucibus eget efficitur vel, tincidunt sed libero. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Donec vitae ultricies ipsum, nec porta est. Phasellus aliquam accumsan mollis. Curabitur nibh nunc, porta tristique suscipit at, dapibus a velit. Ut in erat ac orci sagittis dignissim. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Curabitur ut turpis et eros dignissim sodales.
Quisque et tincidunt enim. Duis rutrum est id libero feugiat efficitur. Ut sollicitudin interdum est eget feugiat. Curabitur felis est, pellentesque sit amet turpis sed, elementum lobortis urna. Duis tempor vitae nulla in malesuada. Ut lobortis luctus lorem ac finibus. Aenean viverra, velit et molestie malesuada, arcu urna posuere velit, vel mollis est velit ac dui. Vivamus pellentesque at mauris non maximus. Sed porta vel dolor ut fringilla. Sed quis metus molestie, maximus nibh eu, rhoncus est. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae;

data.name: ClaimInviteCodeText
data.value: God Speak is a gift, freely given and paid forward, and not self-purchased. If you have received God Speak, it's because someone you know was paiyng their gift forward and they thought about you.

data.name: RequestInviteCodeText
data.value: Quisque et tincidunt enim. Duis rutrum est id libero feugiat efficitur. Ut sollicitudin interdum est eget feugiat.

data.name: ErrorPopupText
data.value: An error occured on our servers, please try again or contact our technical support.

data.name: InviteCodeRequiredMessage
data.value: Sorry, you can't claim a empty invite code.

data.name: RequestInviteSuccessfully
data.value: Your invite was sent successfully. Please check your email.

data.name: ForgotPasswordSuccessfully
data.value: Instructions to help you reset your password were sent to you. Please check your email.

data.name: PictureSourceQuestion
data.value: Where you want to choose your picture?

data.name: InAppPurchaseText
data.value: Please confirm you wish to purchase a credit for {0:C}

data.name: RegisterPagePasswordInfo
data.value: Password must contain: upper, lower, number

data.name: TermsCondititionText
data.value: By creating an account, I accept the Terms and Conditions

data.name: GetStartedCitation
data.value: "So will my word be which goes forth from my mouth; it will not return to me empty, without accomplishing what I desire, and without succeeding in the matter for which I sent it".

data.name: SuccessGiftCodeText
data.value: You made the first step in inviting God to speak into your crazy, busy day. The Word of God works and never fails! Now, purchase multiple GodSpeak gifts to send to your friends, family and God-given circle of influence!

data.name: AnonymousText
data.value:
Please enter your email address to see if anyone has purchased and paid GodSpeak forward to a complete stranger.
If so, we’ll send you their gift!

data.name: AnonymousSuccessText
data.value: An anonymous GodSpeak user has given you a free gift! We emailed your Gift Code to {0}

data.name: SuccessfulRegisterPopupText
data.value: We are now going to take you to the messages screen.

data.name: LoginInvalidEmailPassword
data.value: Sorry, it looks like the email and/or password you submitted are incorrect.

data.name: RecoverPasswordText
data.value: Please enter the email address for your GodSpeak account. Reset instrucitons will be in the email.

data.name: RecoverPasswordSuccessText
data.value: We emailed instructions to reset your password to {0}
